title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 163.7 - Liability of recording officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 163.7 - Liability of recording officer

State Regulations
A recording officer is not liable for any inaccuracy in
any statement on the form prescribed by the commissioner or in the amount of
estimated tax collected so long as he or she collects the estimated tax shown
as payable on the form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
163.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
